summary: Arrow Green Electronics, Inc. is an R2V3-certified ITAD and asset recovery firm based in Hayward, California. Their core business is the professional recycling and buyback of enterprise IT assets, with a strong specialization in data center equipment (servers, storage, CPUs, memory, tape drives) and Apple products. They emphasize secure data destruction through both software erasure and physical methods, and they operate with a focus on environmental responsibility and regulatory compliance. The company presents itself as a B2B service provider, offering tailored solutions for organizations looking to dispose of IT assets securely and sustainably.
